title: Judai ram Bethlehem-ah
lyrics:
Judai ram Bethlehem-ah,
Lal thar a lo piang a,
Amah fakin van miten,
Hla mawi ropui an rawn sa;
"Chungnung berah Pathian chu,
Ropui takin awm rawh se,
Lei chunga mihring hnenah,
Rem leng rawh se,"
Tia Angel-ho zai chu,
Thinlaiah a cham reng e.

A lawmin Lal arsi pawh,
Thangvanah lo eng e;
Mi fingten rawn zui zelin,
Lal thar chibai an buk e.
Mahse, lei lal Heroda'n,
Amah tihboral tumin,
Nauseng zawng zawng a rawt a,
A rapthlak e,
Nimahse, Chungnung kutin,
Tihnat a phal lo ve.

Aw, Nang, hnam tin Lal ropui,
Kan tawngtai ngaithla la;
Kan hnenah awm ve ta che,
Khua pawh a tlai dawn tawh e,
Tin, i hmel eng kan enin,
Lawm lo tu nge awm thei ang?
"Kan zingah Pathian ropui,
A lo cheng ta,
Leilung lawmin a khat e,"
Tiin kan zai tawh ang.
